titles.title: A bill to enhance the prospects for economic development in rural areas by allowing municipal corporations to acquire through eminent domain utility facilities of rural water supply or sewer service corporations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 10/13/1988--Introduced. Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit a municipal corporation or utility to use eminent domain to acquire rural water or sewer associations under specified conditions.
